content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliant Access to EPAM Tools from your BYODevices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3240,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/21fc0f2b-f4ee-4d13-b73d-b26974b62a74/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/21fc0f2b-f4ee-4d13-b73d-b26974b62a74/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"21fc0f2b-f4ee-4d13-b73d-b26974b62a74\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":244,\"height\":66},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The laptops and mobile devices you bring into EPAM from your existing company along with any personal devices you choose to use for access to EPAM systems are considered to be BYOD hardware. Installing the OPSWAT Agent will ensure that your device is compliant to access all the EPAM systems available to you. The Opswat Client may require that you install additional software such as Antivirus, OS updates, or encrypt your hard drive (all required policies). Before your devices are considered compliant, the Opswat client will walk you thru all required remediation steps. The default Access protocols available to you are SSH, HTTP, HTTPS,  RDP and VNC.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Install The Opswat Security Agent from the link below (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"for all BYOD laptops\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/OPSWAT-BYOD\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epa.ms/OPSWAT-BYOD\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For any “client” provided hardware\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" please use this link to install the agent:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/OPSWAT-CUSTOMERDEVICE\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://epa.ms/OPSWAT-CUSTOMERDEVICE\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For mobile device\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", install use your platform’s “App Store” and registration code: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JNHW3UOZ\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to enroll.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Full Access to EPAM Tools & Protocols\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3922,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c77f8081-9f70-422b-8af1-d15b71a2f911/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c77f8081-9f70-422b-8af1-d15b71a2f911/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c77f8081-9f70-422b-8af1-d15b71a2f911\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":314,\"height\":58},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For additional access protocols such as DFS, or SMB or any protocol not mentioned above your device also needs to meet the following criteria: Joined to the EPAM Domain and managed by way of SCCM or JAMF, have all software updates installed, running antivirus, and firewall enabled. In addition, EPAM’s VPN client Global Protect is required for remote access use on certain protocols. Particular Job roles may also require this.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Install the Global Protect Full client from:\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vpn.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://vpn.epam.com\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Easy Access to EPAM Tools\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use the EPAM Connect Mobile App\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Use your platforms App Store and search for \\\"EPAM Connect\\\". Use your EPAM credentials to log in. EPAM connect only allows access to some of EPAM’s tools and in some cases, the Opswat Mobile App is also required. See the registration code above for installation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to get HELP. Visit the Online Support Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4097,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c8a33ca-adad-4092-a2c4-99c2eba0b157/Picture4.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8c8a33ca-adad-4092-a2c4-99c2eba0b157/Picture4.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture4.png\",\"name\":\"Picture4.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8c8a33ca-adad-4092-a2c4-99c2eba0b157\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":315,\"height\":61.99999999999999},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM’s support portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Is your starting place for all things IT (access issues, password resets, software needs, hardware requests). Likewise, depending on your work location there will be a nearby local support engineer who can assist with any face-to-face IT help. You can also send support requests or questions by way of email to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
